article_title: 3 voluntary benefits questions to help employers find the best fit
article_text:
Already have an account? Sign In

Offering a competitive benefits package can bring multiple challenges, with increasing costs, changing health care regulations and an increasingly diverse workforce among them. More employers are turning to voluntary benefits as an option to meet those challenges. But which benefit should they offer?

2. Will the benefit address the majority of our population?

Once a company has decided on the right benefit, it’s time to choose the right partner.

Regardless of the benefit offered, employers should consider providers who offer a robust product and can implement and administer the plan with minimal impact to their business.
